comprehensive_overview: OpenMM is a widely-used open-source toolkit for molecular dynamics simulation. It provides a high-performance, flexible, and easy-to-use platform for the development of computationally intensive simulations of biomolecular systems.
core_features: Efficient implementation of molecular dynamics algorithms
Support for CUDA and OpenCL for GPU acceleration
Python and C++ APIs for easy integration and extensibility
Extensive support for various force fields and integrators
Integration with popular simulation and visualization tools
